content.raw:
**The correct documentation is in the** [**API Documentation**](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/api)**. EXACT duplicate reports will only be scored once.** 

‌

This issue is cause by the difference between the Base Station in the Virtual and Systems Competitions. The disparity is caused by the implications of emulating a Base Station in the Virtual Competition through the Base Station plugin. Since Virtual competitors do not have a Human Supervisor, there is no interfacing layer between the scoring server and the robot identifying and submitting artifact reports.

‌

This will be resolved in future iterations of the SubT Challenge Rules.
